title: Only ONE t210-7s remains!!  Wright available for $40!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Only ONE t210-7s remains!!  Wright available for $40!
posts.post_content:
A nice group of these up for sale today.  I don't think the scans came out as well as I would have liked but shoot me a note about anything you'd like to see and I'll get a better front/back scan headed your way.  Prices include shipping.  Thanks in advance!
Brian

Armstrong PR – damage on front --- $30
Beatty PSA 4.5 - sharp card...no wrinkling! --- $180
Ham SGC 40 - sharp card...no wrinkling! --- $145
Hart VG – no wrinkling --- $125
Hyames PR – creasing, corner wear --- [SOLD!!]
Kelley PR/FR – toughie...wear/wrinkling --- $95
Luyster FR/GD – scuffs on back --- $85
McCormick FR/GD – wrinkling --- $85
Newman PSA 1 - corner & edge chipping --- $65
Sherrill FR – toughie...great pose w/ wrinkling & corner wear --- $95
Simmons GD – toughie...wrinkling --- $110
Wright PR/FR – wrinkling, corner wear --- $65
